```{r}
library(targets)
library(mapdeck)
library(sf)
library(tidygraph)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tar_make()
tar_load(cook_county_homicide_vis_nodes)
tar_load(cook_county_homicide_vis_edges)
```

```{r}
neighborhoods <- 
    filter(cook_county_homicide_vis_nodes, neighborhood %in% c(1:4,6)) |> 
    mutate(
        neighborhood_hex =
            case_when(
                neighborhood == 1 ~ "#85D4E399",
                neighborhood == 2 ~ "#F4B5BD99",
                neighborhood == 3 ~ "#9C964A99",
                neighborhood == 4 ~ "#CDC08C99",
                neighborhood == 6 ~ "#FAD77B99",
            )
    )

mapdeck(
    style = "mapbox://styles/mapbox/dark-v10",
    pitch = 45
) |> 
    add_polygon(
        data = neighborhoods,
        fill_colour = "neighborhood",
        fill_opacity = 175,
        stroke_colour = "#FFFFFFFF",
        stroke_width = 100
    ) #|> 
    add_arc(
        data = filter(cook_county_homicide_vis_edges),
        origin = c("from_lon", "from_lat"),
        destination = c("to_lon", "to_lat"),
        stroke_from = "from_degree",
        stroke_to = "to_degree",
        stroke_width = "weight"
    )
```
